verses.verse: <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> <S%H6318>Potiphar,<s%> an <S%H5631>officer<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s, the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard,<s%> an <S%H376>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> him from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%> that had brought him down <S%H3381>there.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and he was a <S%H6743>prosperous<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%> He was in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H113>master<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian.<s%>
His <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H3068>him,<s%> and that Yahweh made all that he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight.<s%> He <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to <S%H6485>him,<s%> and he made him overseer over his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and all that he <S%H3426>had<s%> he <S%H5414>put<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

It happened from the <S%H227>time<s%> that he made him <S%H6485>overseer<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and over all that he <S%H3426>had,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1558>sake;<s%> and the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was on all that he <S%H3426>had,<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> and in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

He <S%H5800>left<s%> all that he had in <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand.<s%> He <S%H3045>didn't<s%> <S%H3972>concern<s%> himself with <S%H518>anything,<s%> except for the <S%H3899>food<s%> which he <S%H398>ate.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H8389>well-built<s%> <S%H3303>and<s%> <S%H4758>handsome.<s%>

It happened <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> that his <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5375>cast<s%> her <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on <S%H3130>Joseph;<s%> and she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Lie with <S%H7901>me.<s%>"

But he <S%H3985>refused,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H113>"Behold,<s%> my master <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know what is with me in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he has <S%H5414>put<s%> all that he <S%H3426>has<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

He <S%H1419>isn't<s%> greater in this <S%H1004>house<s%> than <S%H3808>I,<s%> neither has he kept <S%H2820>back<s%> anything from me but <S%H859>you,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> <S%H859>you<s%> are his <S%H802>wife.<s%> How then can I <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> and <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H430>God?<s%>"
As she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day,<s%> he <S%H7901>didn't<s%> listen to her, to lie by <S%H681>her,<s%> or to be with <S%H681>her.<s%>
About this <S%H3117>time,<s%> he <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H4399>work,<s%> and there were none of the <S%H376>men<s%> of the house <S%H1004>inside.<s%>

She <S%H8610>caught<s%> him by his <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7901>"Lie<s%> with <S%H5800>me!<s%>" He left his <S%H899>garment<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H5127>and<s%> <S%H3318>ran<s%> <S%H2351>outside.<s%>
When she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he had <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and had <S%H5127>run<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%>

she <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> of her <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> he has brought <S%H935>in<s%> a <S%H376>Hebrew<s%> to us to <S%H6711>mock<s%> <S%H935>us.<s%> He came in to me to <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H7121>me,<s%> and I cried with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

It <S%H8085>happened,<s%> when he heard that I lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>cried,<s%> that he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> by <S%H681>me,<s%> <S%H5127>and<s%> <S%H3318>ran<s%> <S%H2351>outside.<s%>"
She laid <S%H3240>up<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> by <S%H681>her,<s%> until his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>home.<s%>

She <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him according to these <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5650>servant,<s%> whom you have <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H935>us,<s%> came in to me to mock <S%H6711>me,<s%>

and it <S%H7311>happened,<s%> as I lifted up my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>cried,<s%> that he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> by <S%H681>me,<s%> and <S%H5127>ran<s%> <S%H2351>outside.<s%>"

It <S%H113>happened,<s%> when his master <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> which she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "This is <S%H1697>what<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H639>me,<s%>" that his wrath was <S%H2734>kindled.<s%>

<S%H113>Joseph<s%>'s master took him, and <S%H8085>put<s%> him <S%H1697>into<s%> the <S%H802>prison,<s%> the place where <S%H1696>the<s%> <S%H559>king<s%>'s prisoners were <S%H1697>bound,<s%> and he was <S%H5650>there<s%> <S%H6213>in<s%> <S%H1004>custody.<s%>

But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H5186>showed<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to <S%H5414>him,<s%> and gave him <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004>prison.<s%>

The <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H5414>committed<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> all the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> who were in the <S%H1004>prison.<s%> Whatever they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H6213>there,<s%> he was responsible for it.

The <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H7200>didn't<s%> look after <S%H3972>anything<s%> that was under his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H6213>him;<s%> and that which he did, <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made it <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>
